moves.1. e4: Ennemy in sight. 12 oclock. take off immediatly
moves.1... e5: Taking off, nice weather, visibility conditions : ok
moves.2. f4: King gambit. I know little about this trickery opening.
moves.3... g5 4. Bc4 Nc6 5. O-O Bg7 6. d4: All are common moves, approach manoeuvers
moves.7. c3 Nge7: Black's plan is to castle long and attack on the king side
moves.8... d5: To free the LSB and block white on the center at the cost of one pawn.
moves.10... gxf4: As black's plan is to attack the pilot frontly, there is no reason not to take.
moves.11... Qxd5: The position seems equilibrated (only the chess level is not...)
moves.12. Bxf4: Tactical manoeuver preventing black to castle...
moves.12... Rg8: ... so that black slighly changes his plan : still attacking the weak white king but without castling.
moves.13... Bh3: to cover g2, enabling a further Rg2. Black is in white's tail.
moves.14... Kd7: joining the rooks. Now both kings are unsafe but black still has good attacking possibilities
moves.15. Bg3: White makes a barrel to escape black's attack. To prevent 15. ... Bxd4+ 16. cxd4  Rg2+ 17. Ke3 Re8+ and white is in big trouble.
moves.15... Bg4: Pinning the knight and menacing 16. ... Nd4 Black is still in white's tail
moves.16. Nbd2: To protect the knight. It also develops but block the queen.
moves.16... Qf5:
A dangerous left wing glide, to keep menacing the f knight, pine it and protect the LSB to enable 17. ... Re8 but it is a mistake :
16. ... Be7 would have been better. Black sticks to his plan, wanting to keep pressure but overseeing white's next move.
moves.17. Qb3: There comes the loop ! The white pilot is an ace. And white is in black's tail. From now on, white has the initiative. The black queen is needed to protect f7 (mating menace).
moves.17... Na5: Protecting b7 and menacing the queen
moves.18. Qa4+ c6: Only way to keep the rooks joined
moves.19. Rad1: Mayday, mayday ! The black plane is loosing altitude !
moves.20. d5:
! The game is over. If 20. ... Qxd5 21. Nc4, If 20. ... b5 21. Qxa5 with mating menace by 22. Qc7
If rook trade on e8, dxc6+ etc.
moves.20... Nc4 21. dxc6+ bxc6 22. Nxc4+:
Forced mate in 1 : 22. ... Kc8 23. Qxc6
Black quit the plane, opening the parachute before the crash.
Thanks to Stalhandske for this lesson : one must know when to change the plan and defend .
